notes.text:
Since I noticed my turbo whale deck, with a lack of real backrow was struggling against some stuff, like CA, it needed something to deal with them. 

I already knew the deck had great discard synergy with soldier, as fishborg and whale have awesome gy effects. 

Then I realized, running d wrath also gives me more discard power, and sinister serpent is the unsung mvp here. Not only is he a great discard, he can also be used for a 2nd tribute monster to bring out whale, and best of all, he recycles himself, which makes the synergy in this deck extremely powerful.
